name: BabyProtect
description:
It is a 2d shooting game with pixel art style, with fluid gameplay and different options, attacks and enemies which will make it difficult to save the world from space attack.

The game is an infinite level in which the objective is to dominate the game and gradually achieve the best possible score.

An arcade game that will challenge your gamer skills.              
Move - Arrows
shoot - space
Laser - C
Special power - Control(CTRL)


Version 1.0(early access)
